similar.title: Physical activity recommendations during the COVID-19 virus outbreak.
text: Physical activity recommendations during the COVID-19 virus outbreak.

*Confinement and prolonged periods of inactivity incure various health risks and increase levels of stress, depression, and anxiety.*Being physically active is a simple and effective way of addressing these negative effects.*Even in confinement and limited free movement people can remain physically active.*Prevention of COVID-19 infection should not increase other health risks.*Exercise professionals should encourage organizations, local authorities, and governments to promote PA during this period of mass quarantine.
abstract: *Confinement and prolonged periods of inactivity incure various health risks and increase levels of stress, depression, and anxiety.*Being physically active is a simple and effective way of addressing these negative effects.*Even in confinement and limited free movement people can remain physically active.*Prevention of COVID-19 infection should not increase other health risks.*Exercise professionals should encourage organizations, local authorities, and governments to promote PA during this period of mass quarantine.
